solution_line_template: The shoebox is {shoebox_area} square inches because {box_height} x {box_width} = <<{box_height}*{box_width}={shoebox_area}>>{shoebox_area}
The block is {block_area} square inches because {block_side} x {block_side} = <<{block_side}*{block_side}={block_area}>>{block_area}
There are {uncovered_area} square inches uncovered because {shoebox_area} - {block_area} = <<{shoebox_area}-{block_area}={uncovered_area}>>{uncovered_area}
